Name: MarioFacePlanet
Notes: A generic planet with a model and collision intended for use on Starship Mario. It also supports fur maps.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Triggering its cutscene functor action will display the Startship Mario explanation text.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
